text: Nathalia Elisa Timberg (born August 5, 1929 in Rio de Janeiro) is a Brazilian actress. Of Jewish origin, she is the daughter of a Polish father and a Belgian mother. She is one of the most well known and longest active Brazilian actresses of cinema, theater and television. She is known for her roles in Brazilian telenovelas (soap operas) such as in Celebridade, Força de um Desejo, and in Páginas da Vida. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian stage actors Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Actors from Rio de Janeiro Category:Brazilian Jews
title: Nathalia Timberg
